About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only on Tuesdays and Thursdays, 10.00a.m. - 4.00p.m. Archives are closed during school holidays.Copying services available for most records. Photographic reproduction can be arranged. Reference assistance available by email, mail and telephone.

About.Major holdings: Records relating to staff, students and the general administration and everyday life of Melbourne Girls Grammar School since 1893. Photographs and memorabilia.
